name: Doxycycline
food_interaction: The absorption of tetracyclines is reduced when taken with foods, but not to a significant extent.

drug_interaction.Acitratin: Increase the rick of Pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain(rare)

drug_interaction.BCG: Reduce the anti-tumor activity of BCG in the bladder

drug_interaction.Etretinate: increase the risk of pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain (rare)

drug_interaction.Isotretinoin: increase the risk of pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain (rare)

drug_interaction.Ketoconazole: increase the risk of Liver injury

drug_interaction.Levoketoconazole: increase the risk of Liver injury

drug_interaction.Lomitapide: increase the risk of Liver injury

drug_interaction.Mipomersen: increase the risk of Liver injury

drug_interaction.Mycophenolic acid: reduce systemic exposure to mycophenolic acid (MPA) products

drug_interaction.Palovarotene: increase the risk of pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain (rare)

drug_interaction.Pexidartinib: increase the risk of Liver injury

drug_interaction.Tretinoin: increase the risk of pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain (rare)

drug_interaction.Vitamin A: increase the risk of pseudotumor cerebri caused by increased pressure in the brain (rare)
